org.linqs.psl.util

Class RuntimeStats

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.linqs.psl.util.RuntimeStats

  • public final class RuntimeStats
extends Object
    A static class that collects runtime stats in the background. The Config class will try to start stats collection every time a config file is loaded. If the config option exists (and is true), then collection will start. Collections can also be started manually through the collect() method.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String COLLECT_KEY
      Periodically collect stats on the JVM.
      static long COLLECTION_PERIOD_DEFAULT

    • Method Detail

      • collect

        public static void collect()
        Begin the process of collecting stats. If stats are already being collected or the config is not set, nothing will happen.

      • stopCollection

        public static void stopCollection()

      • logDiskRead

        public static void logDiskRead(long bytes)
        Tell the RuntimeStats about an io operation. Since we can't just monitor all IO like memory, we rely on self reporting.

      • logDiskWrite

        public static void logDiskWrite(long bytes)
        Tell the RuntimeStats about an io operation. Since we can't just monitor all IO like memory, we rely on self reporting.

        Ouput collected stats.
